CIRCULAR  NO.    11 /2003 
 
 
Sub: Security stamp on the boarding cards. 
 
 
It has been observed that the security personnel do not affix stamp at the 
prescribed  space on the boarding card with the result that the information on the 
boarding card such as the gate number, seat number etc get obliterated creating  
problems for the airlines staff. 
 
In view of the above, it is requested that airport security staff at the airport 
may please be advised to affix security stamp on the front of the boarding pass in 
the space earmarked in such a way so as to avoid obliterating the details  on the 
boarding pass. The size of security stamp has been prescribed vide this Bureau 
Circular of even number dated 17.1.1992 a copy of which is enclosed herewith. It 
is requested that the security staff  should use the security stamp of the 
prescribed dimension only. The security stamp shall be provided by concerned 
Airport Director/ Airport Management. 
  
 
(R.K.  Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
